definition[0]: a bouncy ball etc quickly moves away from a surface after it has hit it
definition[1]: a bouncy surface is made of a substance that makes people move up and down when they are on it
example[0]: The new bed is nice and bouncy.
definition[2]: someone who is bouncy is always very happy, confident, and full of energy
definition[3]: hair or material that is bouncy goes back to its shape when you press it
